metadataAttributes.Title: Python for Cybersecurity Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Master Python for a variety of cybersecurity tasks. This Specialization provides an application-driven introduction to using Python for cybersecurity.
metadataAttributes.Skills: pre-att&ck, Python Programming, Cybersecurity, attack and defend, Computer Programming, introduction to python for cybersecurity, Persistence, privilege escalation and evasion, Execution, active defense,
